tswitem.name: Inescapable Augment Resonator
tswitem.tooltip:
Inescapable Augment Resonator
An unattuned damage augment.
Resonating this augment to an active ability will decrease the chance that your target evades this ability by 1,5%/ 3%/ 4,5%/ 6%/ 7,5%.
To attune this augment, place it in the assembly window with:
  • 3 Attuned Accurate Augment Resonators
  • 42 Pure wheel runes
  • 54 Pure fire
